channel.title: How do i turn off the thing where you get kicked when you die (ice scape source)
channel.description: lol a lil help would be reallllllllllll nice and im a noob at this so i need to know what to look for

item.title: How do i turn off the thing where you get kicked when you die (ice scape source)
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Open Client.Java And Ctrl + F public void youdied

Scroll Down Until You See teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; disconnected = true; }
Than Change disconnected = true; To disconnected = false;

P.S. FTW Your Using Icescape

Read full topic
item.source: How do i turn off the thing where you get kicked when you die (ice scape source)
